title: Announcement on Bitget listing MSTR, COIN, HOOD, DFDV RWA Index perpetual futures
content:
Announcement on Bitget listing MSTR, COIN, HOOD, DFDV RWA Index perpetual futures
To further diversify our trading products and empower users with more investment choices, Bitget has listed the MSTR, COIN, HOOD, DFDV RWA Index perpetual futures on August 27, 2025 (UTC+8), with leverage of up to 10x.
Note: Bitget RWA Index Perpetual futures currently do not support Unified Account trading.
Try futures trading on our official website or the Bitget App today.
Trading details:
RWA futures Parameters

Once an hour

HOOD/USDT
DFDV/USDT
for more details.
Risk warning:
Futures trading period: 24/5, from Monday 12:00 AM to Saturday 12:00 AM (UTC-4). RWA futures trading will be closed when the relevant financial markets are closed for public holidays.
